title: Only necessary user logs are kept by the service to ensure quality

2. HOW WE USE AND SHARE YOUR INFORMATION

Use of Your Information

We use the information we collect to: provide and improve the Service and our other products and services. customize the Service for you. better understand our users. communicate with you about the Service and our other products and services that we think may interest you. verify the identity of Keybaseâ€™s users. and diagnose and fix problems with the Service.
